page.title: 09TRANSPORT IN ALVINGTON
page.content: The only service bus for Alvington runs from Gloucester to Cardiff. Most households have cars to solve their transport and commuting problems. There are two garages, one selling petrol and the other doing repairs. The Gloucester to Cardiff railway line runs through the area but there is no station. There is very little employment within the village. There is no industry, or tourism, three houses offer Bed and Breakfast accomodation and Bar snacks are available at the two Public houses. The three farms are family owned and managed.
